ygData.subject: Hail Megatron
ygData.msgSnippet: For a minute everything is silent on the battle field. Megatron looks the Decepticons over, in triumph, then down at Motormaster, who is stirring. Motormaster

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="us-ascii"
Date: Wed, 21 Mar 2001 18:17:00 -0700
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Hail Megatron
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

For a minute everything is silent on the battle field. Megatron looks the
Decepticons over, in triumph, then down at Motormaster, who is stirring.

Motormaster strains to get to his feet. The fall had damaged his flight,
and some more of his armor. He looks up at Megatron, then smiles widly.
"You,  You are our Megatron" he says, with no doubt in his voice. "I
thought you were gone forever. My life, belongs to you, and the Decepticon
destiny Megatron. HAIL MEGATRON" he shouts as loud as he can, and puts his
fist up, signaling his choice of leaders.

Speedbreaker looks around, and follows suit, "Hail Megatron" as he
duplicates Motormasters action, and is followed by Beastbox.

Sinnertwin looks at Hun-grr, "What we do?" he asks.
